Claim: "The changes will usher in a sustained period of 'climate system mayhem'."
Referring expressions: The changes, climate system, mayhem  It, could, prove, difficult, resolve
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsUsherIn(a,b) and IsMayhem(c)))) & (forall j (forall i (  IsMayhem(i) ->  IsDifficult(j))))) -> (exists e (exists h (exists g (IsDifficult(g) and (IsProve(e) and IsResolve(h))))))
